communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Anthony Cordesman
communications.communication:
Dear FBI:

This is a request for records under the Freedom of Information Act.

RECORDS REQUESTED

All records related to Anthony Huff Cordesman. He was born on 2 August 1939 ibn Chicago, Illinois, USA. He died on 29 January 2024.

ABOUT THE SUBJECT

Dr. Cordesman was a former intelligence analyst who became a prominent commentator — as well as frequent critic — regarding U.S. policies in the Middle East and beyond. Dr. Cordesman carried significant influence with his essays and analyses on Middle East affairs and other security topics at the Center for Strategic and International Studies think tank, including directing a project on studying Saudi Arabia’s policy shifts under Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman. Dr. Cordesman’s many advisory roles included helping the Defense Department assess the regional fallout from Israel’s victory over Arab forces in the 1973 Yom Kippur War.

PROOF OF DEATH

Seee attached news obituary from the Washington Post.

REQUEST FOR FEE WAIVER

I respectfully request that all fees related to this request be waived. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. If you do decide to charge me fees, please notify me in advance if you expect those fees to exceed $25.

FORM OF PRODUCTION

I would prefer that this request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

CONCLUSION 

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response.

Sincerely,

Nicholas Marritz
